front.title: An Extensible Markup Language (XML) Configuration Access Protocol (XCAP) Usage for Conference Policy Manipulation

abstract.t: This document describes conference policy data elements and themechanisms to manipulate them at a server via Conference PolicyControl Protocol (CPCP). Extensible Markup Language (XML)Configuration Access Protocol (XCAP) is used to implement CPCP. Thisdocument specifies an XML Schema and XCAP application usage that areneeded to implement CPCP.
